title: Rice Salad with Cashews and Spinach

ingredients.item: 2 x 250g packs steamed brown basmati rice
4 sticks celery, washed and finely diced
1 orange pepper, deseeded and finely chopped
2 x 100g packs Waitrose Salad Spinach, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Toast the cashews in a non-stick frying pan, stirring constantly, for 3-4 minutes until golden. Transfer to a plate and allow to cool.  Return the pan to the heat with ½ tsp of oil, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes to soften. Add the rice and stir for 2 minutes. Remove and cool in a large bowl or container.  Add all the remaining ingredients, season well and serve.
